title: From Genes to Clusters: COTAN v2 for Improved scRNA-seq Analysis
text:
Silvia Giulia Galfrè \(^{(1)}\), Marco Fantozzi \(^{(2)}\), Irene Testa \(^{(1)}\), Matteo Tolloso \(^{(1)}\), Andrea Alberti \(^{(1)}\), Alina Sîrbu \(^{(1)}\), Francesco Morandin \(^{(2)}\), Corrado Priami \(^{(1)}\)
\(^{(1)}\) Department of Computer Science - University of Pisa \(^{(2)}\) Department of Mathematics, Physics and Informatics - University of Parma


To download the poster, click here.
The code and data used in the experiments can be consulted here.



The paper presenting the first version of COTAN is accessible here.



COTAN is available as an R package on Bioconductor and on GitHub.
